<template>
      {{questionToupdate}}

</template>
<script>
import questionServices from '../../api/questionServices';
export default {
  name: "UpdateQuestion",
  async created() {
    this.questionToupdate =  await questionServices.getById(this.$route.params.id)
    console.log(this.questionToupdate)
    },
  components: {
  },
  data() {
    return {
      questionToupdate: {
      },
      book: []
    };
  },

  methods: {
  },
};
</script>
